typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> NYCTaxiData
NYCTaxiData select(mapColumn(
		medallion,
		hack_license,
		vendor_id,
		rate_code,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		passenger_count,
		trip_time_in_secs,
		trip_distance,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAllColumns
SelectAllColumns aggregate(groupBy(pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude),
	CountByStartLocation = count()) ~> GetCountofTripByPickupLocation
SelectAllColumns aggregate(groupBy(pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude),
	TotalDistancebyStartLocation = sum(toDouble(trip_distance))) ~> TotalDistanceByStartLocation
